response.overview: Short advertisement film with Chanel's ambassador Timothée Chalamet, who shows his conflict between celebrity and staying true to himself in a dialogue between Timothée Chalamet's artistic sensibility and Martin Scorsese's virtuosity.
response.tagline: The new BLEU DE CHANEL film is an invitation to discover the many facets of a man who is forging his own path.
response.title: Bleu de Chanel
